translations: 用舌头；吹奏管乐器（tongue 的过去分词）

phrs.translation: ◎(猎狗追踪或发现猎物时)狂吠，吠叫[亦作 throw tongue]

sentences.sentence: Julia was a very tough, sharp-tongued woman.
sentences.translation: 朱莉娅是一个非常坚韧，说话尖锐的女子。

sentences.sentence: Nor can I, like that fluent sweet tongued Greek.
sentences.translation: 我也不能，学那舌灿如花的古希腊人。

sentences.sentence: He would, if his sharp-tongued co-author Anna Schwartz is any clue, have condemned the bank bailouts of recent years.
sentences.translation: 正如那位言辞刻薄的合作者安娜.施瓦茨，他会严词谴责近年来对银行业的救助行为。
